byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Jeremy B. Merrill contributed reporting.

abstract: Donald J Trump has made dozens of campaign stops nationwide in past few months in his personal Cessna jet, but Federal Aviation Administration says plane's registration lapsed in January and that plane could be grounded while problem is sorted out.
lead_paragraph: Records kept with the Federal Aviation Administration show the registration for the Cessna lapsed on Jan. 31; the plane could be grounded while the issue is sorted out.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Jet, a Regular on the Campaign Trail, Isn’t Registered to Fly
headline.print_headline: Trump Flying Frequently on a Plane That Isn’t Supposed to Be in the Air

snippet: Records kept with the Federal Aviation Administration show the registration for the Cessna lapsed on Jan. 31; the plane could be grounded while the issue is sorted out.
